name: isomorphic-json-fetch
description: A small wrapper around (isomorphic) unfetch geared specifically for handling JSON app-wide
author: Xunnamius

scripts.build: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production tsc --project tsconfig.types.json && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p && NODE_ENV=production babel src --extensions .ts --out-dir dist/modules && { echo -n '"undefined"!=typeof window&&(window.global=window);'; cat dist/umd.js; } > dist/umd.js-tmp && mv -f dist/umd.js-tmp dist/umd.js
scripts.build-docs: rm -rf tmp-docs tmp-docs-diff docs-diff && typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out tmp-docs --readme none --mode library src/index.ts && find tmp-docs -name '*.md' -exec sed -i -e 's/`__namedParameters`: //g' {} + && find tmp-docs -name '*.md' -exec sed -i -e 's/__namedParameters/\(destructured\)/g' {} + && sed -i -e 1,4d tmp-docs/README.md && if [ ! -d docs ]; then mv tmp-docs docs; exit $?; fi && cp -rf tmp-docs tmp-docs-diff && cp -rf docs docs-diff && find docs-diff -name '*.md' -exec sed -i '/^\*Defined in \[.*\]\(.*\)\*$/d' {} + && find tmp-docs-diff -name '*.md' -exec sed -i '/^\*Defined in \[.*\]\(.*\)\*$/d' {} +; [ $? -ne 0 ] && echo 'build failed (try `npm run check-types`)' && rm -rf tmp-docs tmp-docs-diff docs-diff && exit 1; if [ "$(find ./docs-diff -type f -print0 | xargs -0 sha1sum | awk '{print $1}' | sha1sum)" = "$(find ./tmp-docs-diff -type f -print0 | xargs -0 sha1sum | awk '{print $1}' | sha1sum)" ]; then echo 'no rebuild necessary'; else rm -r docs && mv tmp-docs docs && echo 'build successful'; fi; rm -rf tmp-docs tmp-docs-diff docs-diff
scripts.check-build: test -d dist || npm run build; BABEL_ENV=test jest test/integration.test.ts
scripts.check-types: rm -f npm.pipe; touch npm.pipe; command -v unbuffer >/dev/null; X=$?; [ $X -eq 0 ] && unbuffer tsc >> npm.pipe; Y=$?; [ $Y -eq 0 ] && echo >> npm.pipe; unbuffer eslint . >> npm.pipe; Z=$?; [ $X -ne 0 ] && tsc >> npm.pipe && eslint . >> npm.pipe; W=$?; cat npm.pipe | less -R -FX; rm npm.pipe; [ $W -eq 0 ] && [ $X -eq 1 ] || [ $X -eq 0 ] && [ $Y -eq 0 ] && [ $Z -eq 0 ]
scripts.publishGuard: npm run check-types && npm run test && npm run check-build && npx npm-force-resolutions && npx Xunnamius/sort-package-json && npm run build-docs && npm audit
